services.auth module¶

class services.auth.Auth¶

Bases: object

Authentication service class. Handles user authentication, token generation, and caching.

ALGORITHM = 'HS256'¶
SECRET_KEY = 'your_secret_key'¶
cache = Redis<ConnectionPool<Connection<host=127.0.0.1,port=6379,db=0>>>¶
async create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: float | None = None)¶

Generate a new access token.

Parameters:

  • data (dict) – The data to encode into the token.

  • expires_delta (float, optional) – The expiration time in seconds. Defaults to 15 minutes.

Returns:

The encoded access token.

Return type:

str

create_email_token(data: dict)¶

Create a token for email verification.

Parameters:

data (dict) – The data to encode into the token.

Returns:

The encoded email verification token.

Return type:

str

async create_refresh_token(data: dict, expires_delta: float | None = None)¶

Generate a new refresh token.

Parameters:

  • data (dict) – The data to encode into the token.

  • expires_delta (float, optional) – The expiration time in seconds. Defaults to 7 days.

Returns:

The encoded refresh token.

Return type:

str

async decode_refresh_token(refresh_token: str)¶

Decode a refresh token and extract the email.

Parameters:

refresh_token (str) – The refresh token to decode.

Raises:

HTTPException – If the token is invalid or the scope is not ‘refresh_token’.

Returns:

The email extracted from the token.

Return type:

str

async get_current_user(token: str = Depends(OAuth2PasswordBearer), db: AsyncSession = Depends(get_db))¶

Get the current user based on the access token.

Parameters:

  • token (str, optional) – The access token. Defaults to the token provided by the OAuth2PasswordBearer.

  • db (AsyncSession, optional) – The database session. Defaults to the session provided by the get_db dependency.

Raises:

HTTPException – If the token is invalid or the user is not found.

Returns:

The current user.

Return type:

User

async get_email_from_token(token: str)¶

Decode an email verification token and extract the email.

Parameters:

token (str) – The email verification token to decode.

Raises:

HTTPException – If the token is invalid.

Returns:

The email extracted from the token.

Return type:

str

get_password_hash(password: str)¶

Hash a plain password using the configured password hashing context.

Parameters:

password (str) – The plain password to hash.

Returns:

The hashed password.

Return type:

str

oauth2_scheme = <fastapi.security.oauth2.OAuth2PasswordBearer object>¶
pwd_context = <CryptContext>¶
verify_password(plain_password, hashed_password)¶

Verify a plain password against a hashed password.

Parameters:

  • plain_password (str) – The plain password to verify.

  • hashed_password (str) – The hashed password to compare against.

Returns:

True if the password matches the hashed password, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
